mapper.select: SELECT review_no, user_id, title, TO_CHAR(drawup, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as drawup, reference_no, recommend, R.course_no as courseNo, course_name as courseName FROM REVIEWS R JOIN COURSES C ON R.course_no = C.course_no ORDER BY review_no

SELECT review_no, user_id, title, drawup, reference_no, recommend, content, R.course_no as courseNo, course_name as courseName FROM REVIEWS R JOIN COURSES C ON R.course_no = C.course_no where review_no = #{reviewNo}
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEWS( user_id, title, course_no, content ) values ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{courseNo}, #{content} )
